geocode_display: Russia. Russian Empire. Soviet Union. Former Soviet Republics
notes_display: Reference work on posters created by Lebedev from 1919-1921 for the 'agit'-windows sponsored by the Russian Telegraph Agency (ROSTA). Punin also not unfamous as artist, critic, and second husband of Anna Akhmatova.
Princeton copy 1: Pages 17-24 repeat in this copy.
binding_note_display: pub. orange wraps, col. ill. cover label.
other_format_display: Also available in an electronic version.
other_title_display: The Russian poster, 1917-1922. First issue, V.V. Lebedev.
